summary: The agent report is very good, accurately identifying the main root cause and providing logical reasoning. However, it could improve by including more details on PowerHal's influence and specific CPU frequencies.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified CM as the root cause but missed the influence of PowerHal.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The causal chain was mostly captured but lacked mention of SW_REQ2/SW_REQ3 voting mechanisms.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: Most metrics were accurately identified, but some specific CPU frequencies were missing.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning was logical and correctly ruled out MMDVFS as a cause.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: The suggested fixes were relevant but could be more detailed.
